# options

**Instance Property**

The set of options used to run the kernel.

## Declaration

```swift
var options: MPSKernelOptions { get set }
```

## Properties

- **MPSKernelOptions**: The options used when creating a kernel.
- **device**: The device on which the kernel will be used.
- **label**: The string that identifies the kernel.
